targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(pr_lead_time) AS "Average lead time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date)) AS pr_lead_time,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS lead_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Lead Time (from the first commit to pull request merge), excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: From the first commit to PR raised

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(from_commit_to_share) AS "Development time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0) AS from_commit_to_share,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0)) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Development time, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(time_to_first_response) AS "Time to first reactions"
FROM (
    SELECT
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_response,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0)) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
    ) AS "First responses"
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Time to first reaction, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: Time from the first reaction to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(rework_time)
FROM (
    SELECT
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)), 0) AS rework_time,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)), 0)) AS value_rank
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
      AND rework_completed_date IS NOT NULL
) AS rework_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Rework time, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: Time from last approve to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(from_last_approve_to_merge)
FROM (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date)) AS from_last_approve_to_merge,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                merged_date,
                GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date) as last_action_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
            WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
                AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
                AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        ) AS approvals
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Idle between pull request approval and merge, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
    AVG(pr_lead_time) + STDDEV(pr_lead_time) AS "Upper bound",
    AVG(pr_lead_time) AS "Average lead time",
    GREATEST(AVG(pr_lead_time) - STDDEV(pr_lead_time), MIN(pr_lead_time)) AS "Lower bound",
    AVG(AVG(pr_lead_time)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0) 
                                 ROWS BETWEEN 5 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS "Rolling Average",

    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.90) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pr_lead_time) AS "90th Percentile",
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pr_lead_time) AS "75th Percentile",
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pr_lead_time) AS "25th Percentile"
FROM 
   (
      SELECT 
          shared_for_review_date,
          EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date - initial_commit_date)) AS pr_lead_time,
          PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date - initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
      FROM 
          pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN 
          actor AS author ON author.id = pr.author_id
      WHERE 
          pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
          AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
          AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
          AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
          AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
          AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
          AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS lead_times
WHERE 
    value_rank BETWEEN (0 + $percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1 - $percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 
    1
ORDER BY 
    $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(pr_lead_time) AS "Average lead time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      shared_for_review_date,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date)) AS pr_lead_time,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS lead_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(from_commit_to_raise) AS "Development time"

   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS lead_times

GROUP BY 1

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(time_to_first_response) AS "Time to first reaction" 
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_response,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0)) AS value_rank
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
    ) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(rework_time) AS "Rework time"
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)) AS rework_time,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
        AND rework_completed_date IS NOT NULL
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
    $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
    AVG(from_last_action_to_merge) AS "Idle after approve"
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date)) AS from_last_action_to_merge,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                shared_for_review_date,
                merged_date,
                GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date) as last_action_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
            WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
                AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
                AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        ) AS actions
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT COUNT(*) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT avg(diff_size) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests touch" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(diff_size) as "Total diff"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT 
   $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period),
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count",
   COUNT(pr.author_id) AS "Contributors count",
   AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS "Requested reviewers count",
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count",
   AVG(diff_size) AS "Diff size",
   SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests changes",
   SUM(diff_size) as "Lines changed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period)

WITH reviewer_demand AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN participant.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former employee)') 
            WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
        END AS reviewer_name,
        COUNT(prtcpnt.pull_request_number) AS added_as_reviewer,
        SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_comment_date IS NULL AND prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS did_not_comment,
        SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS did_not_approve
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt 
            ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name 
            AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name 
            AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN actor AS author ON author.id = pr.author_id
        INNER JOIN actor AS participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_employee, participant.login
),
ranked_reviewers AS (
    SELECT 
        reviewer_name,
        added_as_reviewer,
        did_not_comment,
        did_not_approve,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY added_as_reviewer DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY added_as_reviewer ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM reviewer_demand
)
SELECT 
    reviewer_name,
    added_as_reviewer AS "Added as reviewer",
    did_not_comment AS "Did not comment",
    did_not_approve AS "Did not approve"
FROM ranked_reviewers
WHERE rank_desc <= 10 OR rank_asc <= 10
ORDER BY "Added as reviewer" DESC;

panels.title: 10 Most Demanded vs. 10 Least Demanded Reviewers

targets.rawSql:
WITH reviewer_activity AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN participant.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former employee)') 
            WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
        END AS reviewer_name,
      AVG(prtcpnt.comments_count) AS average_comments_count,
      AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date), COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))-shared_for_review_date))) AS first_reaction_in
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt 
            ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name 
            AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name 
            AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN actor AS author ON author.id = pr.author_id
        INNER JOIN actor AS participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_employee, participant.login
),
ranked_reviewers AS (
    SELECT 
        reviewer_name,
        average_comments_count,
        first_reaction_in,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY first_reaction_in DESC, average_comments_count DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY first_reaction_in ASC, average_comments_count ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM reviewer_activity
)
SELECT 
    reviewer_name,
    average_comments_count AS "Average comments count",
    first_reaction_in AS "First reaction in"
FROM ranked_reviewers
WHERE rank_desc <= 10 OR rank_asc <= 10
ORDER BY "First reaction in" ASC;

panels.title: 10 Most Active Reviewers vs. 10 Least Active Reviewers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT personal.repository_name, contributor_name, personal_contribution::numeric/total_contribution*100 as "contribution_percent"
FROM
    (SELECT 
        repository_name, 
        CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
        END AS contributor_name,
        SUM(diff_size) as personal_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name, author.nickname, author.is_former_employee, author.is_bot_user, author.login) AS personal

RIGHT JOIN 
    (SELECT repository_name, SUM(diff_size) as total_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name) AS total
ON total.repository_name=personal.repository_name
ORDER BY personal.repository_name

SELECT 
  grouping_field AS "$group_by_field",
  AVG((GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0))) AS "Development time",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "First reaction got in",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date))) AS "Rework time",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date))) AS "Idle after approve"
FROM (SELECT
        CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
          THEN
            CASE 
              WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
              WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
              ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
          ELSE pr.repository_name 
        END as grouping_field,
        pr.merged_date,
        pr.shared_for_review_date,
        pr.initial_commit_date,
        pr.first_reaction_date,
        pr.rework_completed_date,
        GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date) as last_action_date
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY 1, pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number
) AS activity_stats
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY AVG((GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date)))

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   COUNT(*) as "PRs count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "PRs count"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   SUM(diff_size) as "Total diff"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Total diff"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(diff_size) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Average PR size"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Approval speed"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Reviewers count"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Comments count"

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_size<500 THEN 100 * round(diff_size / 100)
      WHEN diff_size<5000 THEN 1000 * round(diff_size / 1000)
      WHEN diff_size<50000 THEN 10000 * round(diff_size / 10000)
      ELSE 50000 * round(diff_size / 50000)
   END as "Diff size",
   AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   requested_reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
    AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY requested_reviewers_count
ORDER BY requested_reviewers_count

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_size<500 THEN 100 * round(diff_size / 100)
      WHEN diff_size<5000 THEN 1000 * round(diff_size / 1000)
      WHEN diff_size<50000 THEN 10000 * round(diff_size / 10000)
      ELSE 50000 * round(diff_size / 50000)
   END as "Diff size",
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   requested_reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
    AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY requested_reviewers_count
ORDER BY requested_reviewers_count

SELECT pr.*, author.nickname, author.is_bot_user, author.is_former_employee
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT CONCAT(pr.project_name, '/', pr.repository_name, '/', pr.pull_request_number) as pull_request, pr.view_url, pr.integrity_errors
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NOT NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name 
FROM pull_request
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
ORDER BY team_name
list.label: Team
list.name: team_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name 
FROM pull_request
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
ORDER BY team_name

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE 
    pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name
list.label: Repository name
list.name: repository_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE 
    pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name

list.definition:
SELECT 
DISTINCT author_role
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
list.description:
• OWNER: the author is the owner of the repository.

• MEMBER: the author is a member of the organization that owns the repository.

• COLLABORATOR: the author has write access to the repository.

• FIRST_TIMER: the author is making their first contribution to any repository in the organization.

• FIRST_TIME_CONTRIBUTOR: the author is contributing to this particular repository for the first time.

• CONTRIBUTOR: the author has previously committed to the repository but is not necessarily a member or collaborator.

• MANNEQUIN: the author is a placeholder for a previously deleted user.

• NONE: the author has no affiliation with the repository.
list.label: Author role
list.name: pr_author_role
list.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT author_role
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))

list.definition:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
author.id as __value, 
CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END as __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pull_request.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
ORDER BY 2
list.label: PR author
list.name: pr_author
list.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
author.id as __value, 
CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END as __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pull_request.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
ORDER BY 2

list.description: How many percent of the lowest/highest values be excluded from the stats
list.label: Percentage of outliers to exclude
list.name: percent_of_outliers_to_exclude
